CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Grant_Start_Date__c), CASE(MONTH(Start_Date__c), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", 12,"December",'') & ' ' & TEXT(DAY(Start_Date__c)) & ', ' & TEXT(YEAR(Start_Date__c)), CASE(MONTH(Grant_Start_Date__c), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", 12,"December",'') & ' ' & TEXT(DAY(Grant_Start_Date__c)) & ', ' & TEXT(YEAR(Grant_Start_Date__c)))
CustomField.label: Start Date Formatted
